name: 2022 the 5th International Conference on Big Data Management
content: Publicationï¼š As the workshop of ICMLC 2022, after a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the ICMLC 2022 Conference Proceedings as a special chapter, which will be submitted for ACM Digital Library inclusion, Ei Compendex and Scopus index, like the previous conferences.
